  • 方法详细资料

    • openDatabase

      public KeyColumnValueStore openDatabase​(String name, StoreMetaData.Container metaData) throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: KeyColumnValueStoreManager
      Opens an ordered database by the given name. If the database does not exist, it is created. If it has already been opened, the existing handle is returned.
      指定者:
      openDatabase 在接口中 KeyColumnValueStoreManager
      参数:
      name - Name of database
      metaData - options specific to this store
      返回:
      Database Handle
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • mutateMany

      public void mutateMany​(Map<String,​Map<StaticBuffer,​KCVMutation>> mutations, StoreTransaction txh) throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: KeyColumnValueStoreManager
      Executes multiple mutations at once. For each store (identified by a string name) there is a map of (key,mutation) pairs that specifies all the mutations to execute against the particular store for that key. This is an optional operation. Check StoreManager.getFeatures() if it is supported by a particular implementation.
      指定者:
      mutateMany 在接口中 KeyColumnValueStoreManager
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • beginTransaction

      public StoreTransaction beginTransaction​(BaseTransactionConfig config) throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: StoreManager
      Returns a transaction handle for a new transaction according to the given configuration.
      指定者:
      beginTransaction 在接口中 StoreManager
      返回:
      New Transaction Handle
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • close

      public void close() throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: StoreManager
      Closes the Storage Manager and all databases that have been opened.
      指定者:
      close 在接口中 StoreManager
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • clearStorage

      public void clearStorage() throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: StoreManager
      Deletes and clears all database in this storage manager.

      ATTENTION: Invoking this method will delete ALL your data!!

      指定者:
      clearStorage 在接口中 StoreManager
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • exists

      public boolean exists() throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: StoreManager
      Check whether database exists in this storage manager.
      指定者:
      exists 在接口中 StoreManager
      返回:
      Flag indicating whether database exists
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • getFeatures

      public StoreFeatures getFeatures()
      从接口复制的说明: StoreManager
      Returns the features supported by this storage manager
      指定者:
      getFeatures 在接口中 StoreManager
      返回:
      The supported features of this storage manager
      另请参阅:
      StoreFeatures

    • getName

      public String getName()
      从接口复制的说明: StoreManager
      Return an identifier for the StoreManager. Two managers with the same name would open databases that read and write the same underlying data; two store managers with different names should be, for data read/write purposes, completely isolated from each other.

      Examples:

      • Cassandra keyspace
      • HBase tablename
      • InMemoryStore heap address (i.e. default toString()).
      指定者:
      getName 在接口中 StoreManager
      返回:
      Name for this StoreManager

    • getLocalKeyPartition

      public List<KeyRange> getLocalKeyPartition() throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: StoreManager
      Returns KeyRanges locally hosted on this machine. The start of each KeyRange is inclusive. The end is exclusive. The start and end must each be at least 4 bytes in length.
      指定者:
      getLocalKeyPartition 在接口中 StoreManager
      返回:
      A list of local key ranges
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • getHadoopManager

      public Object getHadoopManager() throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: StoreManager
      Returns org.janusgraph.hadoop.HadoopStoreManager
      指定者:
      getHadoopManager 在接口中 StoreManager
      返回:
      A HadoopStoreManager if supported.
      抛出:
      BackendException
